name: Don't Fork It Up!
description:
This is my first ever game jam submission!

For the GMTK 2019 game jam theme 'Only One' I decided to roll with the classic phrase: "You only had one job".

In this game you control a nameless pilot on a quest to continously remove asteroids from a nearby spaceport.

Controls:

W,S: Move forwards/backwards

A,D: Rotate ship

Left Mouse: Fire Grappling Laser.
